block_break.name: Block: broken by a player
block_break.description: Happens when a player breaks a block in the world

subject: IScriptPlayer
the player who broke the block
block: the ID of the block that was broken §7(like minecraft:stone)§r
meta: the block's metadata value from §60§r to §615§r
position: where the block was in the world §7(x, y, z)§r

block_click.name: Block: clicked by a player
block_click.description:
Happens when a player left-clicks §7(with left mouse button)§r a block in the world

§lImportant§r: this trigger only works in survival mode

subject: IScriptPlayer
the player who clicked the block
position: where the clicked block is in the world §7(x, y, z)§r
hand: the hand used to click the block §7(main or off)§r

block_interact.name: Block: interacted by a player
block_interact.description: Happens when a player interacts with a block §7(by right clicking it)§r in the world

subject: IScriptPlayer
the player who interacted with the block
block: the ID of the block that was interacted with §7(like minecraft:stone)§r
meta: the block's metadata value from §60§r to §615§r
position: where the interacted block is in the world §7(x, y, z)§r
hand: the hand used to interact with the block §7(main or off)§r

block_place.name: Block: placed by a player
block_place.description: Happens when a player places a block in the world

subject: IScriptPlayer
the player who placed the block
block: the ID of the block that was placed §7(like minecraft:stone)§r
meta: the block's metadata value from §60§r to §615§r
position: where the block was placed in the world §7(x, y, z)§r

entity_attacked.name: Entity: attacked
entity_attacked.description: Happens when an entity is attacked by another entity

subject: IScriptEntity
the entity that was attacked
object: the attacker who caused the damage
damage: how much HP was taken from the entity
source: the entity that is the source of the damage

entity_damaged.name: Entity: hurt
entity_damaged.description: Happens when an entity takes damage

subject: IScriptEntity
the entity that got hurt
object: the attacker who caused the damage
damage: how much HP was taken from the entity
source: the entity that is the source of the damage

entity_death.name: Entity: death
entity_death.description: Happens when an entity §7(ignore players)§r dies

subject: IScriptEntity
the entity that died
type: what kind of damage killed it
source: the entity that is the source of the death

living_equipment_change.name: Entity: equipment change
living_equipment_change.description: Happens when a living entity's equipment changes

slot: the slot where the item was placed or removed

living_knockback.name: Entity: knockback
living_knockback.description: Happens when a mob or player gets knocked back

ratioX: the knockback ratio on the X axis
ratioZ: the knockback ratio on the Z axis

player_chat.name: Player: chat message
player_chat.description:
Happens when a player sends a chat message

Commands starting with §7/§r don't trigger this event

message: the message text sent by the player

player_close_container.name: Player: closed container
player_close_container.description: Happens when a player closes a container screen like chest, ender chest, furnace, crafting table, etc

inventory: instance of the closed inventory §7(useful only in scripts)§r
position: where the block is in the world §7(only if it was a block)§r

player_death.name: Player: death
player_death.description:
Happens when a player dies

ProTip: if you cancel death, give the player some health or player will get stuck in a death loop

subject: IScriptPlayer
the player who died
source: the entity that caused the death

player_entity_interact.name: Player: interact with an entity
player_entity_interact.description:
Triggered when a player right-clicks an entity

May trigger twice, once per hand

player_entity_leash.name: Player: leash an entity
player_entity_leash.description: Happens when a player leashes an entity

hand: the hand used to leash the entity §7(main or off)§r

player_item_interact.name: Player: interact with an item
player_item_interact.description: Happens when a player right-clicks in the air holding an item

position: the position where the interaction happened §7(x, y, z)§r
hand: the hand used to interact with the item §7(main or off)§r

player_item_pickup.name: Player: picked up an item
player_item_pickup.description: Happens when a player picks up an item in the world

item: item that the player the picked §7(useful only in scripts)§r
entityItem: entity item that the player the picked §7(useful only in scripts)§r

player_item_toss.name: Player: toss an item
player_item_toss.description: Happens when a player tosses an item in the world

entityItem: entity item that the player tossed §7(useful only in scripts)§r

player_login.name: Player: logged in
player_login.description: Happens when a player joins the server

player_logout.name: Player: logged out
player_logout.description: Happens when a player leaves the server

player_lmb.name: Player: left click (air)
player_lmb.description: Happens when a player left-clicks the air without hitting blocks, entities, or items

distance: the total distance the player has walked

player_open_container.name: Player: open container
player_open_container.description: Happens when a player opens a container screen like chest, ender chest, furnace, crafting table, etc

inventory: instance of the opened inventory §7(useful only in scripts)§r
position: where the block is in the world §7(only if it was a block)§r

player_rmb.name: Player: right click (air)
player_rmb.description: Happens when a player right-clicks the air without hitting blocks, entities, or items

player_tick.name: Player: ticking
player_tick.description:
Happens every player tick, about §620§r times per second

ProTip: use the frequency option to limit how often your script or event triggers

projectile_impact.name: Projectile: impact
projectile_impact.description: Happens when a projectile hits an entity or a block

subject: @Nullable IScriptEntity
the entity that was hit
object: the projectile that caused the hit
thrower: the entity that threw the projectile

server_load.name: Server: loaded
server_load.description: Happens right after the server starts but before the world loads

server_tick.name: Server: ticking
server_tick.description:
Happens every server tick, about §620§r times per second

ProTip: use the frequency option to limit how often your script or event triggers

subject: @Nullable IScriptEntity
the player or NPC that changed the state §7(if not global)§r
key: the key of the changed state
current: the current value of the state
previous: the previous value of the state
